overview: 50 Years after the fall of Tibet, Buddhist Masters exiled to Northern India Struggle to maintain their culture, traditions, and heritage. Visit with the most Powerful Buddhist Masters of our Age, including His Holiness the XIV Dalai Lama and His Holiness the XVII Karmapa, as we search for a Heaven in Exile.
tagline: A Buddhist Prince is Crowned, the Dalai Lama waits . . . and the Struggle for Freedom Continues
title: Heaven in Exile
